com.io7m.r2.core.shaders.abstracts

Class R2AbstractLightProjectiveWithShadowShader<M extends R2LightProjectiveWithShadowReadableType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.shaders.abstracts.R2AbstractShader<R2AbstractLightProjectiveWithShadowShader.State,M>
      • com.io7m.r2.core.shaders.abstracts.R2AbstractLightProjectiveWithShadowShader<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of shader parameters
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceUsableType, R2DeletableType, R2ShaderLightProjectiveUsableType<M>, R2ShaderLightProjectiveWithShadowType<M>, R2ShaderLightProjectiveWithShadowUsableType<M>, R2ShaderLightSingleUsableType<M>, R2ShaderLightVolumeSingleType<M>, R2ShaderLightVolumeSingleUsableType<M>, R2ShaderType<M>, R2ShaderUsableType<M>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    R2LightShaderProjectiveLambertBlinnPhongShadowVarianceSingle, R2LightShaderProjectiveLambertShadowVarianceSingle

    public abstract class R2AbstractLightProjectiveWithShadowShader<M extends R2LightProjectiveWithShadowReadableType>
extends R2AbstractShader<R2AbstractLightProjectiveWithShadowShader.State,M>
implements R2ShaderLightProjectiveWithShadowType<M>
    An abstract shader implementation that checks state transitions for correctness.

      • onReceiveShadowMap

        public final void onReceiveShadowMap(com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api.JCGLInterfaceGL33Type g,
                                     com.io7m.jcanephora.texture.unit_allocator.JCGLTextureUnitContextMutableType tc,
                                     R2Texture2DUsableType map)
        Description copied from interface: R2ShaderLightProjectiveWithShadowUsableType

        Set values from the given shadow map context.

        This method will be called once for each projective light that uses the current shader.

        This method will be called after a call to R2ShaderUsableType.onActivate(JCGLInterfaceGL33Type) and before a call to R2ShaderUsableType.onValidate().

        Specified by:
        onReceiveShadowMap in interface R2ShaderLightProjectiveWithShadowUsableType<M extends R2LightProjectiveWithShadowReadableType>
        Parameters:
        g - An OpenGL interface
        tc - A texture unit context
        map - A rendered shadow map

        Set shader values that are derived from the current volume light transform.

        This method will be called exactly once for each light that uses the shader.

        This method will be called after a call to R2ShaderUsableType.onActivate(JCGLInterfaceGL33Type) and before a call to R2ShaderUsableType.onValidate().

                                                       com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLTextureUnitType unit_normals)
        Description copied from interface: R2ShaderLightSingleUsableType

        Set the bound geometry buffer textures for the current shader.

        This method will be called exactly once between calls to R2ShaderUsableType.onActivate(JCGLInterfaceGL33Type) and R2ShaderUsableType.onValidate().

        Specified by:
        onReceiveBoundGeometryBufferTextures in interface R2ShaderLightSingleUsableType<M extends R2LightProjectiveWithShadowReadableType>
        Parameters:
        g - An OpenGL interface
        gbuffer - The geometry buffer
        unit_albedo - The texture unit to which the geometry buffer's albedo/emissive texture is bound
        unit_specular - The texture unit to which the geometry buffer's specular texture is bound
        unit_depth - The texture unit to which the geometry buffer's depth/stencil texture is bound
        unit_normals - The texture unit to which the geometry buffer's normal
